tu1.note: The default display name for this app (if there is not a translation available).

tu2.note: For triggering. This is the unique name for this app to directly invoke it within a voice (spoken) context.

tu3.note: The default short description for the app (if there is not a translation available). This is limited to 80 characters.

tu4.note: The default long description for the app (if there is not a translation available). This is limited to 4000 characters.

tu5.note: The name of the publisher to be displayed to users.

tu6.note: The contact email address for the publisher.

tu7.note: The URL to the ToS (Terms of Service) for the app.

tu8.note: The voice name for this app in the VUI (voice user interface) context. Example values supported: male_1, male_2, female_1, female_2

tu9.note: The external voice name for this app in the VUI (voice user interface) context. Does not contain locale information.

tu10.note: The URL for the app's privacy policy.

tu11.note: Sample invocation phrase displayed as part of app description in the directory of all agents.
